content.text: A mathematics lesson starts at 11 05
The lesson lasts for 75 minutes
Work out the time that the lesson ends
The probability that it will be sunny tomorrow is 0.97
Work out the probability that it will not be sunny tomorrow
Complete the statement
Angle   .........  is a reflex angle
The temperature at \(07 00\) is \(- 3^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
This temperature is \(11^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\) higher than the temperature at 01 00
Find the temperature at 01 00
Jodi swims 22 lengths of a swimming pool to raise money for charity
She receives \(\) 15\(for each length she swims
Calculate how much money Jodi raises for charity
A student measures the angles in a triangle as \(55^{\circ}\), \(85^{\circ}\) and \(50^{\circ}\)
Explain why the student is incorrect
The diagram shows a net of a solid
Write down the mathematical name of the solid
Write \(0.046 875\) correct to 2 significant figures

Reflect this shape in the line \(AB\)

content.text: Change \(645\mathrm{mm}\) into cm
